document.title: Clinical Overview of Aligner Treatment Plan
document.summary: Simple aligner case focused on the upper arch. Estimated duration is 4–6 months. Remote monitoring approach is planned with extensive use of attachments.
key_points: Treatment involves clear aligners for the upper arch.
Duration is expected to be 4–6 months.
next_steps: Ensure all attachments are properly planned and documented.
Set up remote monitoring protocols for the patient.
